item.title: Plastic free July efforts look to keep plastic out of the ocean

item.title: Water quality advisory for North Lido Beach lifted
item.description: The said that tests completed July 10, showed an “acceptable level’ of Enterococcus bacteria.

item.title: Saturday Afternoon and Evening Forecast
item.description: Thunderstorms wil be more widespread next week

item.title: A new Florida handicap parking law is bringing relief to expecting moms
item.description: The law went into effect July 1. the bill was introduced by State Rep. Fiona McFarland.

item.title: Scattered Weekend Thunderstorms
item.description: Beaches also have a slight chance of afternoon thunderstorms

item.title: New Heritage Trail showcases Civil Rights champions across Florida
item.description: A new heritage trail offers a glimpse at sites that played a large role in the Civil Rights movement in Florida.

item.title: Detainees describe worms in food, sewage near beds inside ‘Alligator Alcatraz’
item.description: Detainees inside 'Alligator Alcatraz' are reporting deplorable conditions inside the makeshift migrant detention center.

item.title: New law changes Florida Pre-K program
item.description: A new law in effect ahead of the upcoming school year allows children to transfer to a different Voluntary Prekindergarten program if their family moves.

item.title: New Florida law allows more private school athletes to suit up for public school teams
item.description: The legislation, which took effect July 1, removes previous restrictions that only allowed students from non-Florida High School Athletic Association member private schools to join public school athletics.

item.title: NHC eyes the Gulf as Florida braces for days of downpours
item.description: Some areas may see flash flooding by midweek.

item.title: Democratic leaders tour “Alligator Alcatraz”
item.description: Sunday, several top Florida democrats are slated to return to the state’s newest immigration detention center for a tour, after being turned away a week ago when they showed up unannounced.
